original_title: Brendan O’Connell Is Blocking the Bread Aisle
overview: A short documentary by Brendan O’Connell in which he goes into Walmart stores to paint the aisles he walks and the people he sees. O’Connell says “whatever your views are, positive or negative related to Walmart, it just is. From an artist’s perspective, addressing this environment that is an undeniable component to contemporary life is exciting.”
title: Brendan O’Connell Is Blocking the Bread Aisle
